articles.title: Driving home Ma: Riddhima leaves Delhi for Mumbai to meet Neetu after Rishi Kapoor's funeral - India Today
articles.description: Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, who couldn't attend her father Rishi Kapoor's last rites on Thursday, has left for Mumbai from Delhi by car. She saw the cremation on video call.
articles.content: Rishi Kapoor breathed his last on Thursday morning after a two-year long battle with leukemia. He was cremated at Mumbai's Chadanwadi Crematorium on Thursday, in the presence of a few members of his family and friends. Rishi's daughter, Riddhima Kapoor Sahni,… [+2218 chars]

articles.title: Ramayan is world’s most watched show now, breaks all records with 7.7 crore viewership - Jimmys Post
articles.description: Since March 28, Doordarshan telecast Ramanand Sagar’s Ramayan on public demand. It has now become the most-watched show with 7.7 crore viewers.
articles.content:
Ramanand Sagar’s popular TV serial Ramayan which is re-airing on Doordarshan became the world’s most-watched show on April 16 with 7.7 crore viewers, DD India posted on its official Twitter handle on late Thursday night.
